channel.title: Adding objects giving xp
channel.description: Hello :D i am going to be asking for alot of help on 525 servers because i dont know shit about them so anyway at the min i just need to know how id go about hitting say a door in that training room and it giving you x ammount of xp per hit

item.title: Adding objects giving xp
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

ObjectInteract.java

Advice:

I own W00tSc4p3 which has very stable Object training other then the other 525 servers I have seen, what I did was inter grate XP and Maxhit and made the xp rate 97, so then 97 X 4 X Your Maxhit = Your Xp

Read full topic
